response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This item is not just any product; it's a game-changer in its field, offering unparalleled benefits and features that will significantly enhance your experience. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, I believe it's worth more than what most people would pay for it. Considering its true value, I am offering it to you for $12,000. This is a special opportunity to acquire an item that could potentially save you thousands of dollars in the long run and provide you with unmatched advantages. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget and needs, so we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 12000}
